channel.title: Good weed smoking songs?
channel.description: What are some good songs to listen to while your smoking weed? Just as long as it isn't rap(or deathmetal) then I'll download it.

item.title: Good weed smoking songs?

item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

I suggest you to buy Matisyahu - Youth album, it has many good chiling songs, King without a crown is really good song.

Read full topic

item.title: Good weed smoking songs?
item.dc:creator: @mushr00m mushr00m
item.description:
@mushr00m wrote:

I know this goes against your ‘no rap’ law, but Afroman - Because I Got High is THE song to listen to when stoned.
Or, in my opinion, any drum & bass tune is good, because it has so many layers of bass - the sounds just make you buzz constantly. My advice is to download tunes by like ‘Mampi Swift & Blame - Focus’, ‘Distorted Minds - No Test’, or, if you’re into the dark side of music, tunes by Noisia like ‘Noisia - Believe’ or ‘Noisia & Bad Company UK - Meditation’.

Read full topic

item.title: Good weed smoking songs?
item.dc:creator: @Chrisid Chrisid
item.description:
@Chrisid wrote:

If you want an excuse to be high for a bit, I suggest making it to see how much you like the bands mentioned at wikipedia :

en.wikipedia.org

Stoner rock

Stoner rock, also known as stoner metal or stoner doom, is a rock music fusion genre that combines elements of heavy metal and/or doom metal with psychedelic rock and acid rock. The name references cannabis consumption. The term desert rock is often used interchangeably with the term "stoner rock" to describe this genre; however, not all stoner rock bands would fall under the descriptor of "desert rock". Stoner rock is typically slow-to-mid tempo and features a heavily distorted The descriptor "s...

Personally I like Pink Floyd the best, but I haven’t really had enough time to check out the other bands. In my opinion their three best albums are The Dark Side of The Moon, Wish You Were Here, and maybe The Division Bell but the other albums are nice also.

Heres the list of my favorite songs:

Pink Floyd - 01 - Arnold Layne.mp3
Pink Floyd - 03 - See Emily Play.mp3
Syd Barrett - Octopus.mp3 (He’s still in the band in our hearts)
Pink Floyd - 04 - Flaming.mp3
Pink Floyd - 08 - The Gnome.mp3
Pink Floyd - 10 - Scarecrow.mp3
Pink Floyd - 06 - Echoes.mp3
Pink Floyd - 01 - Speak To Me (Breathe).mp3
Pink Floyd - 03 - Time.mp3
Pink Floyd - 04 - The Great Gig In The Sky.mp3
Pink Floyd - 06 - Us And Them.mp3
Pink Floyd - 01 - Shine On You Crazy Diamond (Part I-V).mp3
Pink Floyd - 04 - Wish You Were Here.mp3
Pink Floyd - 05 - Shine On You Crazy Diamond (Part Vi-Ix).mp3
Pink Floyd - 02 - Dogs.mp3
Pink Floyd - 10 - One Of My Turns.mp3
Pink Floyd - 01 - Hey You.mp3
Pink Floyd - 04 - Vera.mp3
Pink Floyd - 05 - Bring The Boys Back Home.mp3
Pink Floyd - 06 - Comfortably Numb.mp3
Pink Floyd - 02 - Learning To Fly.mp3
Pink Floyd - 08 - Terminal Frost.mp3
Pink Floyd - 08 - Coming Back To Life.mp3
Pink Floyd - 11 - High Hopes.mp3

Note that the first songs are more trippy, around Echoes they start to get more stoner-appealing
Also that you sorta have to be somebody that likes progressive music, if you don’t your probably find it boring

I thank Ron for that website with the list of songs, it was fun listening to them.

My favorite pot related songs are:

Rodney Carrington - Marijuanaville
Afro Man-Cuz - I got high
Bob Marley - Legalize Marijuana
Phish - Marijuana
Steve Miller Band - Fly Like An Eagle
Steve Miller Band - The Joker
Sean Paul - We Will Be Burning

Read full topic

item.title: Good weed smoking songs?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

The Joker - Steve Miller Band
“I’m a joker, I’m a smoker, I’m a midnight toker.”

Fly Like An Eagle - Steve Miller Band
“I want to fly like an eagle, to the seas.”

Take the Money and Run - Steve Miller Band
“Go on take the money and run.”

A Hard Day’s Night - The Beatles
“It’s been a hard day’s night, and I’ve been working like a dog.”

Framed - Cheech and Chong
“Hey man I’ve been framed, no really man I’ve been framed, oh man I do nothing wrong, but this time I get the blame.”

Fire - The Ohio Players
“Fiiiiiyyaaaaa”

Growing Marijuana in my Yard - Unknown to me
“I’m growing Marijuana in my yard…”

Created in the Weed decade of 1970s.

More Weed Songs?

~Ron

Read full topic
